name: Death and Taxes: A Puzzle Game
name_original: Death and Taxes: A Puzzle Game
description:
Two things are inevitable in life: death and taxes: What happens when the tax collector comes knocking in the underworld?

A puzzle tactics game revolving around delaying board moves you don't want to take until you eventually have to use all of your moves.

  • 25 challenging puzzles
  • 4 unique areas
  • New gameplay mechanics around every corner

Credits:

  • Level design, concept and programming by Jordan Guillou (https://twitter.com/JordanAGuillou)
  • Graphics, programming and design by Alice Jankowska (https://twitter.com/AlphishCreature)
  • Soundtrack and SFX by Jake Sidwell
